/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the gray, overcast sky. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. Buildings of different heights and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The image is slightly blurry, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
